purpose: To provide a user-friendly chat interface for interacting with AI agents, enhancing communication and accessibility.
principle: Designed to facilitate seamless interactions between users and AI agents, focusing on clarity, responsiveness, and modern UI design.
reusability: The architecture allows for easy integration and customization, enabling developers to adapt the chat interface for various AI applications.
limitations: Currently in alpha stage, which may result in incomplete features and potential instability; not all AI agents may be fully supported.
name: agent-ui
description: A modern chat interface for AI agents built with Next.js, Tailwind CSS, and TypeScript.
highlight: Seamless integration of modern UI design with AI chat capabilities using Next.js and Tailwind CSS
